# Quick Pattern Reference

## Instant Flags (Never Use)

| Pattern | Fix |
|---------|-----|
| seamlessly | works with, connects to |
| cutting-edge | new, recent, [specific tech] |
| revolutionary | different, new, [specific change] |
| comprehensive solution | [what it actually does] |
| Moreover/Furthermore | [just start sentence] |
| In conclusion | [just end or look forward] |
| plays a crucial role | handles, manages, does |
| dramatically improves | [specific metric] |

## Structural Checks

- [ ] Avoid 3-item lists ("X, Y, and Z")
- [ ] Max 1 em-dash per paragraph
- [ ] Vary paragraph lengths
- [ ] Mix sentence structures
- [ ] Include specific numbers/metrics

## Authenticity Markers

- [ ] States opinion with "I/we prefer"
- [ ] Acknowledges trade-offs
- [ ] Mentions real constraints (budget, time, team)
- [ ] Uses domain-specific terms
- [ ] Admits uncertainty where appropriate
